attributes.action: force MP's to reside in council houses in their constituencies with no second homes, have a maximum wage of £20,000 with no expenses and make MP's have to use public transport to travel to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If our MPs are supposed to represent us, then they should live like us. No more expenses, a wage similar to that of most constituants and one council owned property as family home. As well as that, they should be forced to use public transport to travel to work.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
